--- title: "Marketing Analytics" listing: contents: listings type: grid categories: true sort: "index desc" --- # 💼 Marketing Analytics and Digital Marketing ## 📊 Projects ### 🎮 Nintendo Switch 2 – Flip or Flop A collaborative group project analyzing the sales strategy of the Nintendo Switch and predicting potential outcomes for its successor. - Built data visualizations using **R** and **Quarto Revealjs**\ - Analyzed game-to-console sales ratio using real sales data from **VGChartz**\ - Presented findings with strategic marketing recommendations ![Nintendo Switch 2 - Flip of Flop](Data/Screenshot%202025-05-14%20at%2016.52.16.png) > 📁 [View Presentation (local file)](https://github.com/nickmonge/Nintendo-Switch-2-Flip-or-Flop/blob/7ac764a7db6d1b5ab9bd724498f104adf148dd5a/Nintendo%20Switch%202%20-%20Flip%20or%20Flop%20(Master).html) ------------------------------------------------------------------------ ### 📱 Black Rouge Vietnam Fanpage Management Ongoing management of the official Black Rouge Vietnam Facebook page. - Developed content calendars and creative campaigns - Achieved **+121% reach** and **+98% engagement** - Leveraged influencer partnerships and seasonal promotions ![](Data/494754063_1142730074558886_2599579421646301839_n.jpg) > 🔗 [View Fanpage](https://www.facebook.com/BlackRougeVietnam) ------------------------------------------------------------------------ ### 🌟 Brand Refresh Campaign – Black Rouge Vietnam Led a mini rebranding campaign targeting Gen Z and Millennial audiences. - Introduced new tone and color themes across all digital touchpoints - Increased web traffic and social engagement by over 70% - Collaborated with design and e-commerce teams to ensure alignment ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](Marketing-Analytics_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-1-1.png){width=672} ::: ::: ------------------------------------------------------------------------ ### 📧 Email Marketing Automation Implemented automated email marketing workflows using **Mailchimp** for promotional campaigns. - Increased click-through rates by **33%** via A/B testing - Segment-based targeting improved conversion rates by **18%** - Streamlined newsletter campaigns for seasonal launches ------------------------------------------------------------------------ ## 🎤 Live Events ### 🐾 Cat’s Lab Vietnam Popup Store Activation ::::::: {.grid .grid-cols-1 .md:grid-cols-2 .lg:grid-cols-3 .gap-6} ### 🎮 Nintendo Switch 2 – Flip or Flop ::: card ![Nintendo Switch 2 Project](Data/Screenshot%202025-05-14%20at%2016.52.16.png){.rounded-lg .shadow-md alt="Nintendo Switch 2 Project"}

Supported execution of a themed pop-up store event for **Cat’s Lab Vietnam**. - Coordinated logistics, display, and customer engagement strategies - Conducted market research pre-event to tailor experience - Assisted in real-time content creation and live updates
